title: Sainte-Sigolène
text: Sainte-Sigolène (; <a href="Vivaro-Alpine%20dialect">Vivaro-Alpine</a>: "Santa Sigolena") is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Haute-Loire">Haute-Loire</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in south-central <a href="France">France</a>.
